caption: So tasty!
Tasty poke bowl. Liked customization
Great poke

The poke here is super fresh, and my food was delicious.  The only thing I’d improve is the portion. Even for the large, the portion of rice was skimpy (despite me paying $1 more for an extra scoop) and they weren’t generous with the toppings. Overall the food was really good, and I’ll be going back.
My hotel was next door and I ate here EVERYDAY while on vacation. The poke bowls were delicious and the açaí bowls were even better.

I love this place!!  The food is fresh and delicious.  I've had Poke at so many other places but no other place has come close to the quality of Koa Poke and Burrito!  The owners and the staff treat you like family.
Super nice restaurant the food is great, the prices not that much 😄

One of the reasons why i loved this place is you can create your own poke bowl. All ingredients were super fresh, the place was extremely clean and staff were super attentive to any requests. It’s located in the center of Miami Beach and just a few minutes away from the beach! Great place! Highly recommend!

The best and most delicious poke I have ever eaten! Generous portions of the freshest fish (tuna, crab, lobster or shrimp) with a broad selection of fresh vegetables, toppings and sauces. The burrito was my personal favourite. Highly recommended, healthy food that’s rare to find near South Beach.

I have lived in miami several years and I go out of my way to come to this amazing spot. The staff and owners are some of the nicest people you could ever meet.  They go above and beyond to make you happy and comfortable. The food is …
OMG, this was the best POKE I've ever had in my life. The staff was very friendly and the food was so fresh with generous portions. I can eat every day!!
Good option to go.
Manager was really communicative when we were there waiting on our online order (for like 9 people).

Staying across the street at the Lowes hotel in south beach and found koa poke on line, had great reviews so my wife, 13 year old daughter and I gave it a try.  Glad we did, the best sushi we ever had!  Was given a tour of the Japanese …
Wow wow wow!! Never had a poke bowl that tasted this good. And the customer service is 10/10!!!! Loved it here. I never do reviews so you know it was worth it
This place is amazing. Loved my burrito, my wife never really like sushi, got her a poke bowl from here, she's hooked for life now. Absolutely need to try
Best poke and açaí. Unreal.
One of the beast places to eat healthy food 🍱 they make sushi, salad and açai bowls🙂
best açaí bowls in miami hands down!!! the ingredients are really healthy natural and super fresh.  service is so lovely. also i’m obsessed with their vegan sushi.
The food was so good.

Thank you to the lovely friendly staff for such delicious meals and a friendly atmosphere. We ate at Koa 4 times during our recent Miami visit and tried many different options from their menu including Acai bowls, sushi burritos and sushi …
Best poke bowl I’ve ever had - great variety of toppings and very fresh! Great service and have already been here twice during my short vacation!
Amazing acai bowl and poke bowl! A must visit healthy bowl place!!

Best quick service food on South Beach! My kids loved the sushi, poke bowl & açaí bowl. If you are craving healthy, filling food this is the place. My go back again before we leave! Indoor & outdoor seating available.

The food was tasty and sweet. The totality of our experience at this restaurant was truly remarkable. Last Saturday, my partner and I dined at this great restaurant. We were ecstatic with the operation. Staves are extremely nice and sweet. We'll come back to this restaurant. It is highly recommended!

Amazing Poke!  What a great place - I walked by and it looked so fresh and delicious we had to stop in.  Great selection, lots and lots of topping and sauce choices, and the fish was SO FRESH.  I can't recommend this highly enough - so delicious and huge, the price was worth it. Thanks so much, we will be back!
Awesome sushi, very fresh. Friendly service.
Best poke in Miami! Many delicious proteins and toppings, plus friendly service. #betonmainstreet
The staff is so awesome and nice and everything is always juicy and fresh!
Best sushi burrito ever! Highly recommend!

Great fresh ingredients assembled and presented by an excellent staff that really cares. The owners are often there working and their passion is obvious. If you want to get away from the chains and franchise places and have great poke bowls or açaí , this is THE place in South Beach
Great quality food
Good but overpriced

Tasty Poke! Owner/operators are lovely
The owners of this establishment make it feel much more than a counter service restaurant. Suchi was delicious, acai refreshing and poke so fresh!

This is my first time leaving a review for a business, the food was delightful, the customer service is superb. Very military friendly as well! 10 out of 10 recommend coming here while you are in Miami if you want some sushi.
One of the best poke bowls Ive had.  Compares to ones Ive had in Hawaii.

This is by far the best Poke place in town. Fresh....Fresh and did I say fresh. The people are amazing and if you need any help with the endless choices ask for GOAT. Oh and if you have a chance to have the Açaí don’t miss it, it is simply the best.

Good just expensive and small portions. I was very hungry after my small salad. The protein I chose was edamame falafel.
very good attention and super fresh and delicious food
The best poke bowl I've had in my life. Fresh and high quality ingredients. A surprising find in Miami Beach!

The ingredients were so fresh and delicious. The staff was incredibly friendly and I’m definitely coming back while on my vacation!

Fantastic bowls, fresh and really tasty!

Wow just wow! We walked by and took a chance and were blown away! The service was outstanding. They helped me choose items for ny bowl and made excellent suggestions. The food was beyond delicious. The sushi was superior and my tuna Bowl …

Loved the staff, they were very friendly & fun! Was in and out with my delicious sushi burrito in 5 min! There's also a nice outdoor patio seating area  Got a build your own sushi burrito with lobster & crab mix— really good!  Would definitely return when I visit Miami again!

There are many açaí and poke options in Miami, but this is by far the best one in many ways. The ingredients have integrity, tasting very fresh and vitamin packed. Also, they have unique flavors like truffle ponzu sauce that you just don’t …
Tuna was sooo good!!!
Expensive, but enough to split! Super fresh and delicious
One of the best poke bowls I’ve ever had. Great options and great suggestions!

This place is awesome!  My vegan wife and I had no problem both finding something wonderful to eat here. The eel sauce is just wonderful and all the other ingredients were so fresh and yummy. Will be back for sure
I did not expect much because it looks like a rather sad and sterile takeaway place. The food was so good, I can highly recommend to try a scoop of spicy tuna.
I’m a local that did some research and stumbled upon Koa... did not disappoint! The fish taste super fresh and the sushi rice is delicious. Definitely recommend these poke bowls and we will be back!
Great experience! Best poke bowl I’ve ever had! Service was great and the food was even better!! Today was my birthday and they treated me with so much kindness! Highly recommend!!!
I’m embarrassed to admit I’ve come here 3x times in one day because the food was top notch. Everything was so fresh and the staff are lovely. Highly recommend!!
Great food and great people. Best acai and poke I've ever had!
Tasty food, great service
So good!! Fresh ingredients, good sauce. Look great and people super nice. Lovit.

Koa is an awesome and perfect place to be at anytime of the day! The sushi, the poke and the Açaí bowls are awesomeeeee. I tried everything and everything is super delicious. The açaí bowl is the best one I ever had!! Keep on creating these delicious bowls and sushi’s.
Great quality fish, large portions! Perfect poke!! :)

I walked by this place every day while on vacation and just wasn’t hungry at the time. I decided I wanted poke one day and this place came up well reviewed so I decided to give it a shot. I was not disappointed. The woman serving my food …

This place is the best! We ended up eating here every day of our five day trip. Fish is super fresh, awesome selection of toppings, quick, and excellent service from the friendly staff. Can’t wait to come back!
I live nearby and am sad this is the first time I've eaten here. Absolutely delicious. I love their spicy salmon poke

They have the absolute BEST açaí!! I have tried açaí bowls from many places and this by far is the best. The workers are very nice and the food is worth every penny! I live on the west coast and I would go all the way to Florida just to eat here again:)

Fantastic service and food is phenomenal. Definitely worth every penny! Great for lunch and dinner. Big portions and lots of options! So good!

Liked this place. The food is great. Salmon and spicy tuna tested fresh. Fyi.. if you order sushi and bowl at the same time, it is better to put in the zushi order directly with the cashier before you customized your bowl. 👍
Very fresh ingredients, friendly staff.
Fantastic fresh food!  Great service, a must place to eat .
Super friendly staff and fantasticly fresh.  Loved the spicy tuna roll.

Went to this poke spot my friends and I a few days ago. Absolutely great / fresh fish! We asked for a million sauces and sides and they accommodated everything. Would highly suggest this place for those who want a great / fast / healthy meal at a great price!
OMG🤩customer service 10/10 clean store and very fresh food 🔥👍🏻
Delicious food, absolutely lovely owners. Made us feel at home right away—generous and sweet, thanks guys. We’ll be back for sure.

Excellent service!  The options are incredible, my husband ordered a burrito and I ordered a bowl.  Everything was great.  Hawaiian beer is very good too.  You can order it because you won't regret it. Thanks 😊
Just perfect sushi 🍣 😋 Definitely recommend 👌
Great place!
I ordered the açaí bowl and my husband had a poke bowl. Both were really good! Tons of different toppings for both.

Great Food and Friendly customer service.

Fantastic food and service. I got the poke burrito with the spicy salmon and the spicy tuna. The owners are super lovely and made the experience memorable. If I lived in Miami, then I would come back more often to this spot.
I eat this SO fast each time because it’s so good! Especially love the spicy kimchi. And super fast pickup times as well.

We happened to notice this place which picking up a smoothie next door.  Came back for lunch later that day, and dinner the next day.  The poke is so fresh and delicious.  They have a nice variety of toppings/ingredients that you don't find …

I started off with the açaí bowl, which was a huge serving with tons of toppings.  Since that was so satisfying, I went back in and ordered a protein/poke bowl to go.  Same treatment, a hundred toppings and one of the best I’ve had in Miami so far.  Would definitely come back!
So good, Sebastian from the Miami Beach location is the goat 🐐. Made me a great burrito when I didn’t know all of what I should get haha 5 stars fashoo
The Açaí bowl and poke bowl were both fresh and delicious! The customer service was also top notch, super friendly and attentive! Will be back 🤤
Excellent Poke Bowl ingredients and delicious Acai bowls! We had both. The Berry Energy is highly recommend.
Best healthy option in Miami beach. Outstanding Poke bowls and best açai in town. Undoubtedly a must go.
Delicious poke bowls and Acai bowls in Miami Beach.
Food was fresh and delicious! Not to mention, customer service is phenomenal. Top quality on every level!
Food was delicious and the employees were so nice!

This place is the BEST!! First came in for the Acai bowls which were delicious, but had to come back to try the sushi burritos after hearing rave reviews from the rest of my group. The lobster and crab combo was so delicious with just the …
Food was awesome. Wife got an Acai bowl and I picked up a sushi burrito with spicy lobster and crab. Food was super fresh and the topping choices were excellent. Will be back!
Poke is fresh and Yummy ... owners are very nice - perfect lunch !
Just had a fantastic lunch at Koa! I thoroughly enjoyed the Poké bowl and they even have the option to add delicious homemade kimchi!
Amazing food, GREAT quality, excellent portion sizes, great location. We stayed at a hotel nearby and are so glad we found it!
Perfect service , yam-my food. Best poke and açaí bowl ever tried!!!

All of the ingredients are extremely fresh for their sushi burritos consider it like a chipotle type of restaurant for your sushi burrito or Subway which ever you prefer it’s the same concept that you get to simply add whatever you like to give your taste buds a thrill.
You will love it!  Fresh and delicious.  Clean facility.  Nice & knowledgeable staff.
The reviews are correct! This place is amazing! So fresh, so good.  Totally worth the walk and the cost.  Probably the best poke I have ever eaten, and I have eaten a lot.
(Translated by Google) Their burritos are excellent 😋😊  (Original) Sus burritos son excelentes 😋😊
Amazing poke and great service! Sebastian is the loveliest person ever! You made our day! Thank you!

I traveled almost 2 miles from my hotel to where I was told had the best açaí in town. On the contrary, directly across from my hotel, is the best ever açaí!!! KOA Poke & Burrito is the place to visit! The very best! Great sushi too! Try it!

(Translated by Google) Very good quality, good price, good advice to customize your poke bolw and best of all ... it is very tasty !!! I will repeat  (Original) Calidad buenisima, precio bueno, buen asesoramiento para personalizar tu poke bolw y lo mejor de todo... esta muy rico!!! Repetire

The best!

The food was amazing and the presentation of the finished bowl had me salivating before the flavor exploded in my mouth upon the first bite. Loved the mango and the falafel options. The owner was also so helpful and extremely friendly. You won't regret going here for sure. I'll be back most certainly!
What a great place!!!! The poke bowl was beyond delicious, tasted so fresh and the staff is one of the nicest I've met in Miami so far!!!  Will definitely go back and try the rest of the menu.
The only place I come back over and over to. I have only had the poke bowls but they’re always great. Quick service every time for me personally. Very clean and nice atmosphere.

I just had my first sushi burrito here and it was fantastic! The customer service alone was stellar. They were so nice to us! I highly recommend this restaurant and even better-if you’re a vegan? They got you!!! The vegan edamame falafel was soooooooooo tasty. Definitely a must-try/must-have!
I'm a huge poke fan and this poke was excellent!!!! Definitely add the Lobster.
Loved the poke bowl. Every bite felt like a burst of flavors. The ingredients were incredibly fresh, bright and flavorful. The place was super clean and I will definitely be going back for more ...
Delicious poke bowls! Highly recommend!

Stopped in for a healthy lunch, and wow it was great! Lot of poke bowl places here in Miami but this was really good! We had a bowl with tuna and it was very fresh and rich red colour and a poke burrito with popcorn chicken. Their burritos …
I really liked the garlic fry s and the pastrami sandwich. Service is good and i like small places like this.
Coming here and getting the mint lemonade is a must..My favorite is the tuna melt that comes with side of salad is soooooo delicious.

Delicious food, fresh, wonderful desserts too. Can get crowded, don't be in a hurry! It's worth the wait. They have a wide variety of coffee drinks. Quiet, dim atmosphere, relaxing. Great for a meet- up. Terrific coffee cake muffin; awesome …
Delicious! Balanced, tasty, healthy. Highly recommended!

Great spot in my neck of the woods. I always order the soba noodle salad and honestly it never fails me. Tickle Tree can do no wrong. Plus the owner and the wonderful people who work there are so cordial and inviting. All in all, great experience.  This wonderousness is way more casual (for coffee brunch lunch kind of deal)

This was my first experience with a Poke establishment.  It had to have been one of my best new foods experiences.  It's a bit pricey, but well worth it.  There's no cooking involved (primarily sushi/sashimi style bowls), so food comes …

First time here and the poke bowl is delicious and service is extremely good.😃  If you are a local or visiting Miami you should come. You're not going to regret and if you are lucky your gonna get a free beer! 😂
If you wanna eat poke this ones are DELICIOUS!! The poke bowl was incredible and good size
This is the best I have ever tasted! Staff is very nice and friendly!! Food is splendid!!! Highly recommended!!! Took my mom here for her birthday on Halloween and we had a great experience!!

This place is incredible! Sushi burrito made by 'The Best' sushi roller in Miami! Fresh ingredients, great sized portions, and kind staff. Highly recommend! Will be my lunch/dinner spot before or after the beach!

From the moment we walked in we were welcome. Lucky enough to grab street parking but this spot is so good you should just go up to the nearby garage if you can’t. The tuna on my poke bowl was so fresh and it was made spicy at the moment, …
This place is a golden.  I am flabbergasted how amazing it is.  Please support them as they just opened and we want these businesses to survive covid.
Best poke bowl in the zone.
Amazing food... must try...
The food was excellent and the staff was very attentive and informative. Great variety on the menu. Awesome place for a light lunch. Wish we would have discovered this place earlier in our visit.
Love this place! Their poke bowl is just absolutely amazing! Customer service is fantastic! They listen to you and are super patient
Absolutely delicious and very nice staff. The acai bowl was the best I've had outside of Hawaii!!! Would definitely recommend!

Mouth watering poke bowls packed with flavor 🤤💥 Can easily become your new addiction. I’ve been there 3x in the past 5 days alone! The açaí bowls are deliciously refreshing too! Pairs well as a desert after having an amazing poke bowl. …
Got to admit I'm impressed (especially coming from NYC). Food was on point, delicious, and portion size was solid. Restaurant was clean and employees were friendly!

Great space; great staff, great food. We love variety and sampling from new restaurants; however, once we found Koa we kept coming back. The owners and sushi-chef Max are great; they took great care of us on our short stay in Miami. …
Love coming here after a day at the beach for a fresh açaí bowl. Doesn’t disappoint.

Amazing service! Amazing food. Will go back anytime. Such a great energy ! Sebastian and Astrid are the best! Thank you
This is a must place to go to. They have friendly and helpful customer service and our poke bowls and burrito were fresh and delicious. We will definitely be back.

Amazing and thoughtful service!  The Açaí bowls are out of this world!  Had one for lunch and came back the next day for more

Amazing sushi and acai bowl! All fresh ingredients, very clean and tasty. The owner is super nice, We came back a couple of times! Highly recommended!!!!
Amazing food!
Freshest and most delicious poke bowl. I would willingly trade my first born kid to eat this everyday! 1000/10
We had a superb time in this restaurant. We loved the nice vibes and the meals. The staff members are super affable. I am content we finally decided to visit this place.
I am a local and usually suspicious of any place on the beach. I walked up and ordered the lobster burrito and OMG, it touched my soul. Worth every penny. Will definitely come back... like tomorrow

By far the most delicious poke bowl I’ve ever tried. They serve very fresh fish and delicious lobster for their bowls. The service was also outstanding! This will always be our go-to place when we visit South Beach.
Excellent service, excellent fresh food!!
Amazing Poke! Great amount of food and tastes delicious. Loved the cool toppings!  Super convenient location right on collins av in front of our hotel! Price is worth it
Amazing poke and sushi burrito. For sure will be coming again!

Very good poke ball. A little bit pricy, but worth it!

Very fresh and tasty food! Loved the flavors and choices!

Awesome service, and the food was super fresh and well prepared!
Very fresh and tasty sushi! Shrimp tempura was my fav!
Omg the food is amazing! Clean, super fresh, flavorful, I always order delivery or come over because they are super nice
Amazing place! The food Is very very Good! I love it!😍😍😍😍

My family I are Vegans here from Texas They created an awesome wrap for us ..It was perfect and tasted amazing ..the Staff was super friendly and overall beautiful people .they are pet friendly by the way this place is highly recommended.
Fresh ingredients and great service. Loved the made on demand poke bowls and the delicious Brazilian Açaí!
We live in the neighborhood and just discovered this place. The Poke bowls were exceptionally good. The staff was very friendly & helpful. Highly recommend for a quick & easy, healthy bite.

THE BEST SUSHI ROLLS AND BOWLS EVER AND LETS NOT FORGET TO MENTION THEIR JAW DROPPING ACAI BOWL. THE HOSPITALITY WAS EXCEPTIONAL AND THE BRAZILIAN CHEF MADE US FEEL SO SPECIAL, WE TRIED THE GOSTOZA ROLL FOR THE FIRST TIME AND FELL IN LOVE... THANK YOU SO MUCH WE WILL BE COMING BACK !!

We had a blast here!  Food: Amazing poke: some many toppings choices, large portions, fresh ingredients. And mind blowing acai bowl Supreme Leader.  Staff: Super friendly, welcoming staff, they made us feel so comfortable and cozy  Location: Clean, organized. We also were quite lucky to be the only ones there then
Amazing atmosphere, fresh ingredients and awesome service! Ate a poke bowl every day of my week long vacation 😋😋😋

Amazing!!! Great customer service and has the best poke in the area, we loved it thank you!!
The healthiest, tastiest experience on Miami Beach!  Recommend eating in...or make it a beach picnic  just a block away:-)

Super delicious - my kids got acai bowls, and their staff were so kind to them, even giving them a free box of Pocky sticks. They also helped me craft an awesome poke bowl, and since I ordered my bowl extra spicy, they threw in a free …
Best Poke I’ve ever had! The fish is so fresh!! All ingredients are. I highly recommend The wasabi soya sauce!
👍👍👍👍👍 fresh food, healthy, so delicious, good affordable date location across from the beach

Spicy Tuna Poke with sushi rice!  This has to be the highest quality poke I ever had!  All the ingredients are outstanding and fresh.  The miso is balances well with the poke and has a touch of garlic in it to make it unique.  My favorites are the sweet vinegar cucumbers, shiitake mushrooms and the super fresh Spicy Tuna!
Sushi burrito is an Amazing concept. Place is super clean Owner is very pleasant! Food is full of flavor! Great spot to have a clean fresh meal

Really friendly and outgoing with really good poke bowls. Staff went above and beyond -  just when I thought I had overstayed my welcome they gave a complimentary bottle of water without even asking and cleaned up my tray.

Probably the best poke in Florida. I haven’t had good poke since Hawaii (and never thought I would get again) and this place definitely changed my mind about that! Love the poke bowl and the choices!!!!

Seriously the best poke and açaí bowls EVER. Not only is the food presentation beautiful art, but it is easily the best, freshest tasting food I’ve ever had. Plus it has the nicest and most helpful staff and owner! Amazing place, so please give them your business, you’ll be glad you did!
Very friendly owner and amazing Poke! We really enjoyed how fresh the food was and so many options!
